verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
And never faint
Oh pray full
on and fast
Rough though
the untrod way
Straight on and last

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And never faint
Though those may rave
For rest
The goal
not thee is first
Pray on thou blest

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
And never faint
Though strain
May weigh thee down
Pray on
If thou wouldst fain
Have on the crown

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And never faint
The end thou
mayest not view
When bound
let nought thee bend
Press on anew

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
And never faint
Thy charge to God
Given o'er
Pray on
Thy tent enlarge
Enrich thy store

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
And never faint
Pray on each day
With care
Strive for
Till thou hast won
The answered prayer
